name: Roll Then Dice
description:
In this game you are a chess piece that dodges projectiles of angry dice that want to kill you. Survive as long as possible.

PLAY THE TUTORIAL!!!!!

This game was supposed to be made for the GMTK game jam 2022 but, unfortunately I ready BST as PST and totally missed the deadline. I decided to bite the bullet and add more stuff to the game before I released it.

Expect bugs.
